In environment f : R -> R a : R n' : nat x, l : R Hloc : locally (a * x) (fun x : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= S n')%nat -> ex_derive_n f k x) Hisd : is_derive (Derive_n f n') (a * x) l Unable to unify "is_derive (Derive_n f n') (a * x) l" with "is_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f (a * y)) n') x (a * a ^ n' * l)".

original: intros Hloc Hisd. unfold is_derive_n in Hisd. destruct n as [|n']. - simpl. rewrite Hisd. reflexivity. - rewrite Derive_n_comp_scal in Hisd. rewrite Derive_n_comp_scal. simpl. rewrite Derive_n_scal_l. rewrite <- Derive_n_comp_scal. apply is_derive_n_scal_l. apply Hisd.
